title: The Shah of Iran's visit to Australia 1974
brief_description: Official greeting by the Governor General Sir William Kerr, the Prime Minister and Mrs Whitlam, as well as senior parliamentarians and leading members of the diplomatic corps, mark the beginning of a busy week of engagemnets for the Royal couple through the Eatern states of Australia.
